main_section_html:
How to Join

Ready to make a difference with FOSS? Join OASIS today and become part of a growing alliance driving technological innovation for social good.

Membership Criteria

  • A demonstrated commitment to FOSS-centric activities.
  • Active participation in OASIS events, workshops, and initiatives.
  • Adherence to OASIS’ guiding principles and framework.

Ready to make a difference? Join us today!
name: membership

page_blocks.web_template_values: {"title":"Membership","content":"Joining OASIS means becoming part of a vibrant network committed to leveraging Free and Open-Source Software (FOSS) for social impact. Whether you’re an individual, organization, or institution, membership offers an opportunity to contribute, collaborate, and grow."}

{"title":"Who can join?","columns":"2","features":[{"idx":1,"__islocal":true,"title":"Tech Volunteers & Innovators","name":"row 1","content":"Individuals and organizations developing or implementing FOSS solutions tailored for the social sector."},{"idx":2,"__islocal":true,"title":"Technology Providers & Vendors","name":"row 2","content":"Companies offering FOSS-based services, tools, and consultation."},{"idx":3,"__islocal":true,"title":"Philanthropic Institutions","name":"row 3","content":"Organizations looking to build tech capacity among their beneficiaries."},{"idx":4,"__islocal":true,"title":"Social Sector Organizations","name":"row 4","content":"NGOs, non-profits, and other citizen-sector entities eager to adopt FOSS for transformative impact."}]}

page_blocks.web_template_values: {"title":"Activities","content":"At OASIS, we are dedicated to transforming the social sector through the power of Free and Open Source Software (FOSS). Our activities are designed to empower organizations with practical tools, knowledge, and support to create lasting impact."}

{"bgg_color ":"Blue","content_summary":"Advocate FOSS technology adoption in the social sector via hands-on, evidence based showcasing of successful technology implementations.","illustration":"https://oasishq.org/files/vector1.svg"}

{"bgg_color ":"Blue","content_summary":"Capacity and awareness building of FOSS technologies via workshops, training sessions, meetups, and technical demonstrations.","illustration":"https://oasishq.org/files/vector2.svg"}
{"content_summary":"Develop and disseminate educational resources, playbooks and case studies.","illustration":"https://oasishq.org/files/vector3.svg"}

{"content_summary":"Work with tech organisations and vendors to build easily usable, low-maintenance FOSS technologies tailor made for solving recurring problems in social sector organisations.","illustration":"https://oasishq.org/files/vector4.svg"}
{"content_summary":"Engage with broader FOSS, technology, and social innovation communities and showcase opportunities in the social sector.","illustration":"https://oasishq.org/files/vector5.svg"}

main_section_html:
Empowering change through open source

We are a network of organizations united by the vision that Free and Open Source Software (FOSS) can empower citizen-sector organizations and communities to create positive impact at scale.

FOSS (Free and & Open-Source Software) enables access to libre, low-cost, and sustainable solutions and promotes transparency and collaboration.

Read about FOSS & Social Sector ->

Tools that create value

We are a network of organizations united by the vision that Free and Open-Source Software (FOSS) can empower citizen-sector organizations and communities to create positive impact at scale.

Benefits of FOSS

By adopting FOSS, organizations in the social sector can leverage powerful tools, reduce costs, and contribute to a collaborative ecosystem of technological innovation.

Cost-Effective

Reduces software expenses, especially beneficial for non-profits and small organizations.

Customizable

Can be tailored to specific organizational needs.

Transparent

Open code means better security and privacy control.

Community-driven

Benefits from continuous improvements by a global community of developers.

Promotes Innovation

Encourages collaborative problem-solving and knowledge sharing.

Open Source

The source code is openly available, allowing users to study how the software works.
